name: Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 01 to 05
overview: With nowhere else to go, Arisaka Shiori took a job at Mihama Academy. Now, three months have passed since she started her somewhat special position as a teacher at the “school of assassins.” While she has tried her best to adapt to her new surroundings—and it seems like her students have finally accepted her—her teacher evaluation is not quite so agreeable.
